entry.title: French Discoverer of HIV, Luc Montagnier, Dies at 89
entry.content: French researcher and Nobel laureate Luc Montagnier, who led the team that identified HIV, the virus that causes AIDS, and who more recently spread misinformation about the coronavirus, has died.

entry.title: Inside Boris Johnson's 'Partygate' Scandal: Wine in the Garden and Lockdown Jokes
entry.content: Anger over parties held at Downing Street during Covid restrictions has the U.K.â€™s leader fighting to stay in power. It could prove a rapid fall from grace for the man who upended British politics.
